content.rendered:
I’m so honored to be featured in Entrepreneur.com magazine and I’m excited to share the spotlight with so many other talented entrepreneurs. Click to read full article on entrepreneur.com and check out part of the article below.

“Work-Life balance – Find time to stop working each day and make time for yourself. Do the things that are important to you for your health, family and spirit.

Constantly evolve – If you’re not evolving, your competitors will gain ground on you and eventually you will be replaced. You always have to be up on the trends and technology of the industry in order to stay ahead of your competition.”

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Wishing you all tons of love, health, and happiness!
